text: 8.11: FG 2.24; 1 Ko 3.16; 6.14; 2 Ko 4.14; Ef 2.5Nde mba ntige ki fhavi, nta vhɨzi fhavi ma. Fhe Bakɨme taagiap Zisas Krais khavgi. Nde maaŋ muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar nden vhen kɨrga, nde rimgirga, Fhe Bakɨme taagi nde khavgip ana won Ŋina Ŋaarar panan zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨn nden nɨɨnga, nden fhavi wom vhɨzgirga fhu.
